com.deniz.balanced.business

Interface UserBackendService

  • All Superinterfaces:
    FrameworkBackendService<UserEntity>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    UserBackendServiceImpl

    public interface UserBackendService
extends FrameworkBackendService<UserEntity>
    Interface for backend to be seen from service layer
    Takes entities from dao layer, has all business logic
    Author:
    deniz.yavas

        Parameters:
        userId - id of the user who changes password
        oldPassword - persisted password
        newPassword - new password which user enters
        Throws:
        PasswordWrongException - throws if password is wrong
        NotValidIdException - throws if a critical fail is detected

        Parameters:
